garimagai92[at]yahoo.co.jp | CV

Garimagai Borjigin is currently a postdoctoral fellow at Visual Media Lab (Prof. Hideki Kakeya) at University of Tsukuba. He received Ph. D in Engineering at University of Tsukuba, Japan in 2022. He is interested in autostereoscopic displays, super-multiview displays, integral volumetric imaging, virtual/augmented reality (VR/AR).
